title: Raw string literals contain carriage returns
body:
by **jacobsa@google.com**: 
The [spec][1] says this:

> Carriage returns inside raw string literals are discarded from the raw
> string value.

However, they appear to wind up as part of the string's contents. This program
prints two lines for me:

    http://play.golang.org/p/IDWTgtxxwn

Is the spec wrong here, or the compiler? Or is it possible that this was
changed recently and the Go Playground has version skew?

[1]: http://golang.org/ref/spec
